TEXT.TITLE: EASTERN KANSAS FEEDLOT CATTLE STEADY - USDA
TEXT.BODY:
slaughter cattle steady in slow trade amid moderate demand, the usda said. sales confirmed on 400 steers and 1,100 heifers. week to date 2,700 head. steers - choice with end good 2-3 1075-1100 lbs 69.25. heifers - choice with end good 2-3 975-1025 lbs 67.00-68.00.
Reuter
